backend/main.mo: Motoko backend handling user profiles, selfie submissions with simulated scoring, session storage, and permission checks via AccessControl.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten short summaries for all frontend files across the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme file defining OKLCH color tokens and dark-mode variables for global styling.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file loading the React app entry point and defining the app container.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app orchestrating authentication, profile setup, page navigation, and themed UI rendering.
frontend/src/components/auth/Authenticat: Wrapper component that renders children only when a user is authenticated.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button managing Internet Identity login, logout, and loading states.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting first‑time users to enter and save their display name.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Layout component providing header, navigation tabs, footer, and wrapping page content.
Displays current and potential selfie ratings with explanations, badges, and a disclaimer.
frontend/src/features/history/HistoryEmp: Shows an empty state encouraging users to take their first selfie, with an image and button.
frontend/src/features/history/HistoryPag: Fetches and displays a grid of past selfie sessions with ratings and timestamps, and opens a detailed score dialog.
Handles capturing or uploading selfies, validating and uploading files, and showing resulting scores.
frontend/src/features/workouts/WorkoutIl: Renders a card containing a workout illustration image.
frontend/src/features/workouts/WorkoutsP: Lets users select workout preferences and generates a personalized workout plan with safety guidance.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, and stored identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, selfie sessions, and counts via an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/blob-storage.ts: Implements an ExternalBlob helper for creating blobs from URLs or bytes with optional upload progress tracking.
frontend/src/lib/score/explanations.ts: Generates badge labels and a description based on image result enums for selfie scoring.
frontend/src/lib/score/format.ts: Offers safe formatting and numeric conversion utilities for rating values.
frontend/src/lib/selfie/upload.ts: Reads a file into bytes, wraps it in ExternalBlob, tracks progress, and returns a generated URL.
frontend/src/lib/selfie/validation.ts: Validates selfie file type and size against JPEG/PNG/WebP and a 10MB limit.
frontend/src/lib/workouts/generator.ts: Builds workout plans based on goals, frequency, and equipment, returning structured exercise routines.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom themes, colors, containers, and animation utilities.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, including app goals, features, issues, and image update requirements for a selfie-based looksmaxxing fitness app. Documents existing functionality, known bugs, and architectural notes for future development.
